comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content:
Seems to be the former Lillian Stokes Holmes (b. 1884), who was engaged to marry J. D. Crimmins Jr. in 1903.

John Daniel Crimmins, apparently her father-in-law:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3313651965/]

comment.author: 34985608@N03
comment._content: pennylrichardsca: Thanks for tracking down her full name.  We'll add it to  the source data and reload the description.
